name: tribeca
description: Self-hosted high frequency automated market making cryptocurrency trading platform

scripts.diff: _() { echo $2 $3 version: `git rev-parse $1`; }; git remote update && _ @ Local running && _ @{u} Latest remote && npm run log-git
scripts.latest: _() { git rev-parse $1; }; npm run diff && test `_ @` != `_ @{u}` && npm run reinstall || echo Already running latest `_ @{u}` version!
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules app && git fetch && git merge FETCH_HEAD && npm install && npm restart
scripts.postreinstall: # ..done! Please refresh the GUI if is currently opened in your browser.
scripts.postinstall: npm run compile-service && npm run compile-client && npm run compile-pub && npm run compile-bundle
scripts.compile-service: tsc --alwaysStrict -t ES6 -m commonjs --outDir app src/service/*.ts src/service/*/*.ts src/share/*.ts
scripts.compile-client: tsc --alwaysStrict --experimentalDecorators -t ES6 -m commonjs --outDir app/service/pub/js src/client/*.ts src/share/*.ts
scripts.compile-bundle: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ babili es2015 ] ] app/service/pub/js/client/client.js | uglifyjs > app/service/pub/js/client/bundle.min.js
scripts.start: npm run test-compile && forever start -a -l /dev/null tribeca.js
scripts.test-compile: test -d app || npm $(test -d node_modules && echo run post)install
scripts.test-cov: ts-node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover --report lcovonly --dir test/coverage -e .ts _mocha -- --compilers ts:ts-node/register test/*.ts
scripts.send-cov: cd test && cat coverage/lcov.info | codacy-coverage && istanbul-coveralls

author: Michael Grosner
